system.requirement: If you wield a bladed weapon in each handâ€¦

abilities.description: When you @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash}, you may add +2. If you do (decide before rolling), inflict +1 harm on a strong hit and count a weak hit as a miss.
Once per fight, when you @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} +edge by making a bold display of your combat prowess, you may reroll any dice.

When you @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.c0967ba47f57393b]{Draw the Circle}, choose one (before rolling).

  • Add +2.
  • Take +2 momentum on a hit.
